name: You're not alone (rajesh6872)
description:
GAME MADE FOR MY FIRST GAME JAM EVER (BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2022.2)

also my first game ever finished

all sounds made by me and stuff on my desk, scripts created all by me using unity docs, models from assets.

game is boring and crappy af but i learnt a lot (scripting, terraing building, triggers, and mostly how to make a sounds with a can, my mouth, a spoon, and a fan)

credits, Sewi - mental support, fawoorki support - bug tester
